attributes.action: To specifically change the UK driving licence organ donation wording.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the UK Application for a driving licence, Section 3 from: I want to register my details on the NHS Organ Donor Register as someone whose organs/tissue may be used for transplantation after my death. Please put X in the boxes that apply.
Change to:
Please put X in the boxes that "don't" apply.
This NOT 'presumed consent' it's agreed and signed consent made on the driving licence application form.
